scenes.name: the bridge
scenes.description:
The door opens onto a stone platform in a large natural cave. Opposite the entrance in the distance is another stone platform. 
Between them, a series of wooden disks is suspended from the ceiling by massive steel chains. The cave floor seems to be covered by a pool of boiling mud. 
 - continue 
 - leave

scenes.name: missing_planks
scenes.description:
You notice there is a boiling geyser spouting mud between your platform and the next. Do you wait to jump, or jump now? 
 - jump 
 - wait to jump

scenes.name: success
scenes.description:
You wait for one moment for the geyser to shoot one last time - if you had jumped just then, you'd have been a goner!
 - continue

scenes.name: death
scenes.description:
You jump, and are immediately hit by a boiling hot geyser of mud and sent plummeting to your death. 
This is the end. 
 - quit
